p: Spells gain extra effects at max rank.  Dark Sphere: Deals 25% more damage against champions. Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage. Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%. Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.
q: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
w: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.
e: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
r: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
